relations.head: Cytokines
relations.label: activate
relations.text: The STAT1 transcription factor is activated in response to many cytokines and growth factors.

relations.head: STAT1
relations.label: inhibit
relations.text: Stat1(-1-1) animals were born at normal frequencies and displayed no gross developmental defects. However, these animals failed to thrive and were extremely susceptible to viral disease

relations.head: Growth factors
relations.label: activate
relations.text: The STAT1 transcription factor is activated in response to many cytokines and growth factors

relations.head: Interferon
relations.label: activate
relations.text: Stat1(-1-)ES cells were unresponsive to interferon (IFN), but retained responsiveness to leukemia inhibitory factor (LIF) and remained LIF dependent for undifferentiated growth

relations.head: LIF
relations.label: affect
relations.text: Stat1(-1-)ES cells were unresponsive to interferon (IFN), but retained responsiveness to leukemia inhibitory factor (LIF) and remained LIF dependent for undifferentiated growth
